description: The BR-30 Regional Transport Office (DTO) is the primary vehicle registration and licensing authority for the Sitamarhi district in Bihar. Situated in the Dumra administrative area, it serves as a critical hub for transport governance in the Tirhut Division, managing everything from driving licenses to road tax collection. The office is strategically significant due to its location in a border district, facilitating both local transport and cross-border trade regulations with Nepal.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Dumra, Sitamarhi, Bihar
